articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Psychedelics Activate Serotonin to Produce Antidepressant Effect - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study advanced our understanding of how psychedelic drugs activate serotonin receptors to offer potential treatments for neuropsychiatric disorders.

articles.title: Computer models suggest modern plate tectonics are due to blobs left behind by cosmic collision - Phys.org
